executable.title: ClipTubes
executable.description: Return a set of tubes contained in a bounding box
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the TubeTK project at Kitware.

file.name: sourceTREFile
file.label: Source TRE File
file.description: TRE file that is used as base for clipping

file.name: clipMeTREFile
file.label: TRE that needs to be clipped
file.description: TRE file that will be clipped

file.name: outputTREFile
file.label: Output TRE File
file.description: Output TRE file containing tubes going through the Box
